entry.title: The Safety of Sports Grounds (Designation) (Amendment) Order 2015
entry.summary: This Order amends the Safety of Sports Grounds (Designation) Order 2015 (S.I. 2015/661) to provide for the designation of the Recreation Ground in Bath, and the Hive Stadium in Edgware, Middlesex, as sports grounds requiring a safety certificate under the Safety of Sports Grounds Act 1975.

entry.title: The Preesall Underground Gas Storage Facility Order 2015
entry.summary: This Order authorises Halite Energy Group Limited (referred to as “the undertaker”) to construct and operate an underground gas storage facility and associated infrastructure in Preesall, Lancashire.

entry.title: The Income Tax (Limit for Rent-a-Room Relief) Order 2015
entry.summary: Chapter 1 of Part 7 of the Income Tax (Trading and Other Income) Act 2005 (c. 5) (“ITTOIA”) provides relief on income from the use of furnished accommodation in an individual’s only or main residence. The relief is referred to as “rent-a-room relief”. The form of relief depends on whether the individual’s total rent-a-room amount (as defined in section 788 ITTOIA) exceeds the individual’s rent-a-room limit for the tax year. Section 789 ITTOIA determines the individual’s rent-a-room limit for the tax year. The “limit” is the maximum amount of rent-a-room income that is exempt from tax. This Order increases the limit from £4250 to £7500.

entry.title: The Ecclesiastical Offices (Terms of Service) (Amendment) Directions 2015
entry.summary: These Directions amend the Ecclesiastical Offices (Terms of Service) Directions 2010 to provide that references in those Directions to the Employment Rights Act 1996, or to regulations made under it, are read as references to that Act, or to those regulations, as amended from time to time (rather than, as is currently the case, as references to the Act or regulations that had effect on 1st January 2011, when the Directions came into force).

entry.title: The Loan Relationships and Derivative Contracts (Change of Accounting Practice) (Amendment) Regulations 2015
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Loan Relationships and Derivative Contracts (Change of Accounting Practice) Regulations 2004 which make provision for certain debits and credits not to be brought into account in the first accounting period of a company beginning on or after 1st January 2005, and for those debits and credits instead to be brought into account over a ten year period (beginning with the first period of account on or after 1st January 2006), or not to be brought into account for any period.

entry.title: The Social Security (Units of Additional Pension) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2015
entry.summary: These Regulations specify the amount a person will receive in return for each unit of additional pension as a result of paying a Class 3A voluntary National Insurance contribution. The payment of Class 3A contributions is provided for by sections 14A to 14C of the Social Security Contributions and Benefits (Northern Ireland) Act 1992 (“the Contributions and Benefits Act”), as inserted by paragraph 17 of Schedule 15 to the Pensions Act 2014 (c. 19). Section 25 of, and Schedule 15 to, the Pensions Act (Northern Ireland) 2015 provide for the resulting payment of extra additional State Pension.

entry.title: The Ecclesiastical Property (Exceptions from Requirement for Consent to Dealings) Order 2015
entry.summary: This Order provides that the consent of the relevant diocesan board of finance is not required for certain property transactions by parochial church councils or certain ecclesiastical trusts.

entry.title: The Housing and Regeneration Transfer Schemes (Tax Consequences) Regulations 2015
entry.summary: These Regulations provide for the tax consequences of certain transfers in accordance with transfer schemes under section 333DA of the Greater London Authority Act 1999 (c. 29) and under section 53A of the Housing and Regeneration Act 2008 (c. 17). The schemes permit the transfer of designated property, rights or liabilities of specified public bodies respectively to the Greater London Authority (or a company or a body through which it exercises functions in relation to housing or regeneration) and to the Homes and Communities Agency.

entry.title: The Ecclesiastical Offices (Terms of Service) (Amendment) Regulations 2015
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Ecclesiastical Offices (Terms of Service) Regulations 2009 (“the 2009 Regulations”).

entry.title: The Lombards Wall to Gravesend Bridge Internal Drainage District Order 2015
entry.summary: This Order confirms (with modifications) a Scheme submitted by the Environment Agency making provision for the abolition of the Lombards Wall to Gravesend Internal Drainage District.

entry.title: The Pensions (2015 Act) (Consequential Amendments) (Units of Additional Pension) Order (Northern Ireland) 2015
entry.summary: This is the first rule to be made under section 50 of the Pensions Act (Northern Ireland) 2015. This Order makes consequential amendments to primary and secondary legislation as a result of the introduction of increased additional pension attributable to units of additional pension. A person may pay a Class 3A voluntary National Insurance contribution in return for a unit of additional pension which results in an increase in the weekly rate of the additional pension in a Category A, B or D retirement pension.

entry.title: The Housing (Right to Buy) (Prescribed Forms) (Amendment) (England) Regulations 2015
entry.summary: Regulation 2 of these Regulations substitutes the form of notice to be used by a tenant claiming to exercise the right to buy his or her dwelling-house in accordance with section 122 of the Housing Act 1985 (c. 68) (“the 1985 Act”). The Regulations apply in relation to houses and flats in England only.

entry.title: The Occupational and Personal Pension Schemes (Automatic Enrolment) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2015
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Occupational and Personal Pension Schemes (Automatic Enrolment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2010 (“the 2010 Regulations”) by reducing the information requirements on employers, introducing certain circumstances where the employer duty is turned into a discretion and prescribing alternative quality requirements for defined benefits schemes.

entry.title: The Occupational Pension Schemes (Charges and Governance) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2015
entry.summary: These Regulations impose obligations on trustees and managers of certain occupational pension schemes in relation to charges imposed by and governance of those schemes. They are the first regulations to be made under Schedule 18 to the Pensions Act (Northern Ireland) 2015 (“the 2015 Act”).

entry.title: The State Pension Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2015
entry.summary: The Pensions Act (Northern Ireland) 2015 (“the Act”), creates a new state pension for people reaching pensionable age on or after 6th April 2016 (see Part 1 of the Act). It replaces the existing state pension. These Regulations set out some of the detailed rules relating to the new state pension.

entry.title: The Immigration (Passenger Transit Visa) (Amendment) (No. 2) Order 2015
entry.summary: This Order amends the Immigration (Passenger Transit Visa) Order 2014 which requires certain passengers to hold a transit visa to pass through the United Kingdom without entering whilst transiting to another country.

entry.title: The Fire and Rescue Services (Appointment of Inspector) (Wales) Order 2015
entry.summary: This Order appoints Desmond George Tidbury as an inspector under section 28(1) of the Fire and Rescue Services Act 2004 in its application to Wales. An inspector is appointed under section 28(1) for the purpose of obtaining information as to (a) the manner in which the fire and rescue authorities in Wales are discharging their functions and (b) technical matters relating to those functions.

entry.title: The Antarctic Act 1994 (Isle of Man) (Amendment) Order 2015
entry.summary: This Order amends the Antarctic Act 1994 (Isle of Man) Order 1995 (S.I. 1995/1035), which extended the Antarctic Act 1994 (c. 15) to the Isle of Man with certain modifications, to extend the amendments made to that Act by Part 2 of the Antarctic Act 2013 (c. 15) to the Isle of Man.

entry.title: The Inspectors of Education, Children’s Services and Skills (No. 3) Order 2015
entry.summary: This Order appoints the persons named in the Schedule as Her Majesty’s Inspectors of Education, Children’s Services and Skills.

entry.title: The Syria (Restrictive Measures) (Overseas Territories) (Amendment) (No. 2) Order 2015
entry.summary: This Order amends the Syria (Restrictive Measures) (Overseas Territories) Order 2012 (S.I. 2012/1755) (“the principal Order”). The principal Order gives effect in specified Overseas Territories to sanctions in respect of Syria adopted by the European Union in Council Decision 2013/255/CFSP, as amended.
